name: Pakistan
interestingFact: Pakistan has the world’s second-highest mountain, K2, and the largest irrigation system on Earth.

name: United States
interestingFact: The U.S. has no official national language and is one of the most culturally diverse countries.

name: China
interestingFact: China is home to the Great Wall, the longest man-made structure ever built.

name: India
interestingFact: India is the world’s largest democracy and has over 1,600 spoken languages.

name: Japan
interestingFact: Japan has more than 6,800 islands and is famous for its advanced technology and traditions.

name: Germany
interestingFact: Germany is known for inventing the automobile and having over 1,500 varieties of sausage.

name: France
interestingFact: France is the most visited country in the world by tourists.

name: United Kingdom
interestingFact: London has over 170 museums and the UK has no single written constitution.

name: Brazil
interestingFact: Brazil is home to the Amazon Rainforest, producing about 20% of the world’s oxygen.

name: Australia
interestingFact: Australia has more kangaroos than humans and the Great Barrier Reef is visible from space.
